name: Property Possession
description:
Hi there, thanks for taking some time to read this.   This Project was made for the "A Dark Room" Game jam!

This is both my very first game jam and very first game.  I feel like I went in the opposite direction of the theme and make a cute spoopy game over a scary one.   But I think it managed to start within the the theme of a single room.  I know the concept has been done before, but I liked the idea a lot.  But it's always possible I completely missed the mark... but that's the learning process.

Anyway, feel free to tell me if there are massive bugs or issues.  Harsh Criticism is acceptable but do keep in mind I'm brand new to this.  The music is also randomly generated, so hopefully its not too ear grating.  The SFX are either recorded from my phone or playing with various SFX programs.  The Color palette is "Gothic Bit Palette" from HiroHi on Lospec, its only a 10 bit monochrome so my colors were limited.  And lastly the engine I used was Construct-3, and its been a great learning experience.

Once again, thanks for stopping by!

Edit: Doubled the Timer speed and Value Decay.  And fixed a looping bug
